coreAttributes.name: Feral up
coreAttributes.description: A small unusually shaped flask with a crude drawing of an anthro and a feral on it.

effectTooltipLines.line: [style.boldBad(Is known to destroy the universe when consumed by non fully animal races)]

coreAttributes.applyEffects:
#IF(npc.getRace().isFeralPartsAvailable()) #IF(npc.isFeral()) u anthro now. [##npc.setBody(npc.getGender(),npc.getSubspecies(),RACE_STAGE_GREATER,true)] #ELSE u feral now. [##npc.setFeral(npc.getSubspecies())] #ENDIF #ELSE

The universe got destroyed, you now assume control over an alternate reality you that simply threw the Feral up away.

#ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first removing the cork, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the flask up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. [npc.She] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the mysterious liquid.
useDescriptions.otherUse: After first removing the cork, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the flask up to [npc2.namePos] waiting [npc2.lips]. [npc2.She] [npc2.verb(tilt)] [npc2.her] head back and [npc2.verb(start)] drinking the mysterious liquid.
